Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.strategies

Class HardcoreBuildStrategy

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.strategies.HardcoreBuildStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
InteractionStrategy, MakeBuildStrategy
public class HardcoreBuildStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements MakeBuildStrategy
Hardcore strategy for building on the board. No suggestion supplied, and player loses violating card's must rules.
